message: I propose a fair, but slightly uneven split.  I'll take the lion's share, but you still get a good chunk.  Accept and we can both walk away happy.
I'll take a smaller share, but I think this is a fairer split. What do you say?
Let's be reasonable. We're both losing money with each passing round. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile for me.
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can get a better deal than this. Your turn to compromise!
This is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.  We're both losing too much money with every round.
I'm not ready to split it evenly yet. I think I can do better than that. You're getting desperate, aren't you?
Okay, I'm willing to give you a bit more.  But this is my final offer. We're both losing out at an alarming rate.  Let's end this before we both end up with nothing.
